API_Description: If the user has permission to remove links from the document, removes all the links on the specified page within the specified coordinates

nPage.description: The 0-based index of the page from which to remove links.

oCoords.description: An array of four numbers in rotated user space, the coordinates of a rectangle listed in the following order: upper-left x, upper-left y, lower-right x, and lower-right y .
